comments.body: Should we add a link to https://github.com/moby/buildkit/issues/1560 in the comment so we can remove the note if/when the the issue gets resolved?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@ADD bin/wincat-windows-amd64 /Windows/System32/wincat.exe

# NOTE(claudiub): docker buildx sets the PATH env variable to a Linux-like PATH,
# which is not desirable. See: https://github.com/moby/buildkit/issues/1560
# TODO(claudiub): remove this once the issue has been resolved.
